item.title: Where no Windows Machine? Luck of space? Travel a lot? Let's use AWS as is Cloud Gaming platform
item.description: Why Could Gaming? What is the Problem? Link to heading Usually, for PC gaming, it is required to have a nice and fresh PC. But time does not stand still; there are many things that change us. The simplest one is that our PCs just get old, and we can’t run new titles at high specs anymore, just because of hardware limitations. What’s next? If we are going to update our setup, this means a huge upfront cost.
